title: The Love Child
description: Hawk fell deeply in lust for Jade, his stepsister. Unfortunately, she was just sixteen at the time. And she was looking up to him as her big brother. He went abroad and just came back for her debut. After the party, he planned to go back to work. But he saw a scene that made him mad with jealousy, Jade had a boyfriend. Hawk got drunk and invaded her room. The room was in darkness. Jade responded with an answering lust. He took what was offered but with a heavy heart. Her lust was for the boyfriend, not him. After that fateful night, he never came home again. Until the news of Jade being a single mom...When he saw the precious little baby boy, he knew that sinful night had bore fruit. But how could Hawk own his son?www.rlmendoza.com/thelovechild
author: R.L. Mendoza
